attributes.action: Support self employed trades people during the Coronavirus outbreak.
attributes.background:
Provide financial support to self employed trades people.
Keep the trade supply shops open, if we can't get parts then we can't repair people houses, loss of hot water, blocked toilet etc

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
